snippet: The number of deaths linked to the problem is now more than triple the automaker’s original estimate of 13.
abstract: Kenneth R Feinberg, lawyer overseeing program to compensate victims of General Motors' defective ignition switch, says 42 death claims are eligible for payment; amount is more than triple original estimate of 13.
lead_paragraph: The number of deaths linked to the problem is now more than triple the automaker’s original estimate of 13.

headline.main: Lawyer Raises Death Toll to 42 in Faulty G.M. Vehicles
headline.print_headline: Lawyer Raises Death Toll to 42 in Faulty G.M. Vehicles
